entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 70 in wind prone areas. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
